text.7: ENSCO Avionics is looking for talented Engineers to help verify embedded software applications for the next generation of commercial aircraft. Your responsibilities will span the full DO-178C Verification Process, from reviewing software requirements to designing and executing requirement-based tests. The software testing process involves the use of Special Test Equipment (STE) to monitor and control the hardware interfaces that interact with the embedded software applications under test. Test procedures are developed through automated scripts that interact with National Instruments LabVIEW Virtual Instruments for controlling the STE.
